title: Tangerine Dream - The Melrose Years (2009) 3-CD Set
description:
In late 2002 Tangerine Dream released a set of three CDs, titled The Melrose Years.

It includes the three studio albums Optical Race (1988), Lily On The Beach (1989) and Melrose (1990), all completely re-recorded in 2002 (nevertheless the release is subtitled 'The Re-Recordings 2003'). 

Furthermore each CD includes one bonus track that was not released on the original albums. 


Tangerine Dream

The Melrose Years

The Re-Recordings 2003

2009 Reissue

featuring

Optical Race (1988)

Lily On The Beach (1989)

Melrose (1990)


3CDs / 2009 / VBR-V0


Tracklist:

CD 1 "Optical Race" (1988): 

1. Atlas Eyes (4:07)
 
2. Cat Scan (5:31) 

3. Mothers of Rain (5:05) 

4. The Midnight Trail (5:49)
 
5. Twin Soul Tribe (4:39)
 
6. Turning Off the Wheel (6:08)
 
7. Optical Race (3:27) 

8. Ghazal (4:50)
 
9. Marakesh (8:17)
 
10. Sun Gate (4:42) 

11. Ruling the Waves (4:46) (Bonus - Previously Unreleased) 

Info: A TANGERINE DREAM recording which brought Edgar Froese and Peter Baumann together again after eleven years, but this time it was not on a musical exploration. Peter Baumann had just founded his record label "Private Music" on which the album was then released.
 

CD2 "Lily On Tne Beach" (1989): 

1. Lily on the Beach (4:12) 

2. Crystal Curfew (5:22) 

3 Desert Drive (3:49)
 
4. Mount Shasta (4:23) 

5. Valley of the Kings (5:03)
 
6. Radio City (4:02) 

7. Alaskan Summer (3:56) 

8. Blue Mango Cafe (4:10)
 
9. Paradise Cove (3:47)
 
10. Too Hot for my Chinchilla (3:51) 

11. Twenty-Nine Palms (3:23)
 
12. Gecko (3:27) 

13. Long Island Sunset (6:56)
 
14. Pearl River (6:05) (Bonus - Previously Unreleased) 

Info: This marks the beginning of a longer relationship with acoustic wind instruments. On the track "Radio City" Jerome Froese appears the first time on a TD recording. 


CD 3 "Melrose" (1990):

1. Three Bikes in the Sky (6:00)
 
2. Yucatan (5:23) 

3. Rolling Down Cahuenga (6:47) 

4. Desert Train (10:23)
 
5. Dolls in the Shadow (5:11) 

6. Cool at Heart (6:05) 

7. Art of Vision (5:32)
 
8. Electric Lion (8:16) 

9. The Back of Beyond (7:45) (Bonus - Previously Unreleased) 

10. Melrose (5:43)

Info: The last recording with Paul Haslinger and the last album for Private Music. On "Melrose", Jerome Froese is introduced as a permanent member of the band.


:)
